name: Angel - The Silver Sword [Demo]
description:
The Game is set in two Worlds. The alternate World, and the World of the MMO "The Silver Sword". In the alternate World the Story will be more focused, while in the fictional MMO, The Silver Sword, the gameplay will be more focused.

This is a demo! You will learning a bit about the main character and some of the gameplay mechanics.

System Requirements

    MINIMUM:
    • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
    • CPU: Intel Core2 Duo or better
    • RAM: 2 GB or more
    • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
    • HDD: 500MB for the German Version//540MB for the English Version
    • Display: 1280x768 or better Display
